query:
SELECT 'users' as table_name, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT 'inspections', COUNT(*) FROM inspections
UNION ALL SELECT 'tmlReadings', COUNT(*) FROM tmlReadings
UNION ALL SELECT 'professionalReports', COUNT(*) FROM professionalReports
UNION ALL SELECT 'componentCalculations', COUNT(*) FROM componentCalculations
UNION ALL SELECT 'auditLog', COUNT(*) FROM auditLog;

UNION ALL SELECT 'inspections', COUNT(*) FROM inspections
UNION ALL SELECT 'tmlReadings', COUNT(*) FROM tmlReadings
UNION ALL SELECT 'professionalReports', COUNT(*) FROM professionalReports
UNION ALL SELECT 'componentCalculations', COUNT(*) FROM componentCalculations
